Package magellan.library.io.file

Class PipeFileType

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.library.io.file.FileType
      • magellan.library.io.file.PipeFileType
  • public class PipeFileType
extends FileType
    A FileType that directly pipes its input (from createReader()) to an outputstream ( createOutputStream()).
    Author:
    stm

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class magellan.library.io.file.FileType

    • Constructor Detail

      • PipeFileType

        public PipeFileType()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a pipe file. Everything written to the reader given by createReader() will be directly written to the writer given by createWriter(String). There is no actual file involved.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

        A PipeFileType does not create backups.

                            throws java.io.IOException
        A PipeFileType does not create backups.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
